pkgmetadata.longdescription: ODR-DabMux is a DAB (Digital Audio Broadcasting) multiplexer compliant to ETSI EN 300 401. It is the continuation of the work started by the Communications Research Center Canada on CRC-DabMux, and is now pursued in the Opendigitalradio project.

use.flag: Uses cURL to download the TAI-UTC bulletin, needed for the EDI output.
